_comment: JSON format should correspond to nx::vms::analytics::EngineManifest
The list of supported event types for an Axis camera is loaded dynamically from that camera.
No predefined event types exist, so the 'eventTypes' element in this JSON is empty.
Event types with the topics not from AllowedTopics are filtered out.
Event types with the descriptions equal to one of the forbiddenDescriptions list are filtered out.

items.name: Network.Metadata.LocalPort
items.caption: Local port
items.description: Local TCP port where server expects to receive metadata from camera. When set to 0, will be chosen by the host OS.

items.name: Network.Metadata.ExternalAddress
items.caption: External address
items.description: IP address or domain name (optionally followed by TCP port after colon) of the server from camera's perspective. This is where the camera will send metadata. If empty, the server's local IP address is used. If the port is 0 or omitted, event reception port is used.
